fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Turn a player to stone at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Stoned players will be revealed at the beginning of the day and cannot do anything at all, even talk or vote.
Once a stoned player is visited three times, they will be unstoned.
You may choose to turn yourself to stone but will still be able to use your abilities.
Instead, you may unstone yourself and all stoned players.
Once you turn yourself to stone, you may secretly attack a player that has been stoned for two nights during the day.
Players killed while they are turned to stone will not be revealed as dead until they are unstoned.
Stoned players still count towards the voting majority, even if dead.
Dead players are cleaned when unstoned if you were the one who unstoned them.
